# About the Creator

My name is **Garrett Warr**, a biotechnology student at **Utah Valley University** with a passion for data science, public health, and real-world problem solving.

This website was created as my **final project** for my Data Science class, combining data analytics, public health data, and interactive web technologies to tell the story of influenza trends over the past 20 years.
